mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Honeycomb", "This 'N That", and "Mutable Muddle". ROUND DANCES "Kubush Kapers", and "Waltz Softly". SPECIAL FEATURES "By Pogostick Through Europe", "What's Being Danced?", "The Square Dancers' Christmas", "Rounds - Let's Discuss 'Em", "Our Hats Are Off to the World's Best Salesman - YOU", and "California Associations". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Style Series: All Eight Chain", "Paging the Roundancers (Ruth & Lawrence Risen)", "Square of the Month (Les Boyer)", "Round the Outside Ring", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
